"Dark Blast":
"About Dark Blast

With \"Dark Blast\", you can learn and check details of various new skills and abilities for your Dark Blast transformation.

[Learn Skills]
You can learn new skills for your Dark Blast, and enhance skills that you have already learned.
※You cannot enhance or learn skills during a quest.

[Setting a Transformation Pose]
You can set a pose to use when transforming. You can select from Lobby Actions that you have already acquired."

"[Reset Skills]
Resets all of your Dark Blast's skill levels. All EXP spent on learning or enhancing skills is refunded.

※Skill unlock conditions will not be reset.
"
